summary: Julie, star of cycling, is two races to win the World Cup. It is the culmination of years of effort. Julie loves the spotlight. His entourage too. Encouraged by her coach and doctor, she ... See full summary »
cast: Laurence Leboeuf|Patrice Robitaille|Denis Bouchard|Josée Deschênes|René-Daniel Dubois|Judith Baribeau|Jeff Boudreault|Sébastien Delorme|Pascale Desrochers|Mélanie Pilon|Virginie Ranger-Beauregard|Valérie Chevalier|Julie Renault-Roy|Benoit Guerin|Vincent Leclerc|Pierre Houde|Robert Frosi|Emilie Guillaume|Marlène Wintgens|Jean-François Garceau|Philippe Legros|Josiane Lessard|Patrick Benoit|David Gagné|Pierre Gaudette
title: La petite reine
